column4: all yall running 64 bit stuff, is it mostly so you can dual boot and do 64 bit gaming in windows?
wouldnt touch windows x64 with a crane and a pole
i wouldn't touch windows unless i had to do so anyway, but... what's the point of 64 bit computing for everyday uses?
well im running 32 bit windows for gaming, 64 bit linux for everything else - biggest downfall is having an ATi card atm.
